Package com.ae2dms.UI

Class SoundPreferenceController

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.UI.SoundPreferenceController
public class SoundPreferenceController
extends java.lang.Object
The controller class for SoundPreference

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isMute
    whether it is globally muted or not
    javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty isShowing
    whether this control pane is showing or not
    private javafx.scene.layout.Pane MusicControl
    The Underlying JavaFX Control Pane used to control the show and hide of this controller
    private javafx.scene.control.ListView MusicList
    The JavaFX list to show all songs
    private javafx.scene.control.Label MusicName
    The JavaFX Label to display the name of the song
    private javafx.scene.control.Slider MusicProgressSlider
    The JavaFX Slider which progress is sync to the progress of the song and user can drag to change the progress
    private javafx.scene.control.Slider MusicSlider
    The JavaFX slider to control the volume of playing Music
    private javafx.scene.control.Label MusicSliderValue
    The value to indicate how much volume the music is set, with max of 100
    private javafx.scene.control.Label MusicTime
    The JavaFX Label to display the music time, in 02:13/04:23 format
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView MuteImage
    The Image which indicated if it is in mute mode or not
    private javafx.scene.control.Label MuteLabel
    The Text to indicate if it is in mute mode or not
    private GameMediaPlayer player
    The GameMediaPlayer that this controller can control, including volume, songs and progress
    private javafx.scene.control.Slider SFXSlider
    The JavaFX slider to control the volume of playing Sound Effects(SFX)
    private javafx.scene.control.Label SFXSliderValue
    The value to indicate how much volume the SFX is set, with max of 100

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    SoundPreferenceController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void clickMuteAll()
    click between mute all and open to 80% volume
    void initialize()
    Called by JavaFX to bind the Sliders with corresponding SliderValue and bind the SliderValue to the global preference in Main if all volume is set to 0, then the mute button will be automatically set and bind the musicList in GameMediaPlayer to the list view
    void updatesDurationSlider()
    should be called when a song's progress has changed will update the position of progress slider with sync

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • SoundPreferenceController

      public SoundPreferenceController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Called by JavaFX to bind the Sliders with corresponding SliderValue and bind the SliderValue to the global preference in Main if all volume is set to 0, then the mute button will be automatically set and bind the musicList in GameMediaPlayer to the list view

    • updatesDurationSlider

      public void updatesDurationSlider()
      should be called when a song's progress has changed will update the position of progress slider with sync

    • clickMuteAll

      private void clickMuteAll()
      click between mute all and open to 80% volume
